message:
Anamika is a student of English department(2nd year) of LEADING UNIVERSITY, SYLHET. She is suffering from serioustype of Blood Cancer. Only blood can save her. 100 bags of blood is needed. 5bags per day. Her blood group is B+(Positive). She is in GREEN VIEW CLINIC, DHAKA. Cabin no: 409.
